jobs.title: Founding AI Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Us

Surreal helps the most notable figures in the world protect and license their AI likeness. We’re founded by folks who have 30+ Emmy nominations, backed by Open AI & Quiet Capital, and have already signed up household names (think folks with over 100 million followers). We’re looking for strong technical builders to join our founding team.

The Role

As the Founding AI Engineer #2, you will play a critical role in shaping our tech stack and engineering culture by working closely with the founders. Some of the problems you will be working on are:

  • Use generative AI technologies to process and classify large volumes of data.

  • Build and deploy autonomous agents to scale critical workflows.

  • Fine-tune multimodal models to improve accuracy and reliability of our systems.

We are hiring in-person in SF bay area.

Responsibilities

  • Zero to One: Build core products from the ground up and set foundations to scale them.

  • Ownership: Take full ownership of products from ideation through development and into production, iterating based on customer feedback.

  • Learning: Stay current with the latest generative AI advancements and explore innovative ways to leverage them into our products.

About You

  • Experience: You have 5+ years of hands-on software engineering experience in a fast-paced environment.

  • Systems: You have a deep understanding of large scale systems with experience building data pipelines, managing cloud infrastructure, cutting edge databases and standard deployment practices.

  • Generative AI: You have been hands-on with generative AI, experimenting, testing, and creatively solving real-world problems with it.

  • Bonus: You are a previous startup founder or founding engineer.

If you’re excited about building something truly unique, working with cutting-edge technology, and being part of a collaborative and ambitious team, we’d love to hear from you!

ABOUT US

Surreal helps the most notable figures in the world protect and license their AI likeness. We’re founded by folks who have 30+ Emmy nominations, backed by Open AI & Quiet Capital, and have already signed up household names (think folks with over 100 million followers). We’re looking for strong technical builders to join our founding team.


THE ROLE

As the Founding AI Engineer #2, you will play a critical role in shaping our tech stack and engineering culture by working closely with the founders. Some of the problems you will be working on are:

 - Use generative AI technologies to process and classify large volumes of data.

 - Build and deploy autonomous agents to scale critical workflows.

 - Fine-tune multimodal models to improve accuracy and reliability of our systems.

We are hiring in-person in SF bay area.


RESPONSIBILITIES

 - Zero to One: Build core products from the ground up and set foundations to scale them.

 - Ownership: Take full ownership of products from ideation through development and into production, iterating based on customer feedback.

 - Learning: Stay current with the latest generative AI advancements and explore innovative ways to leverage them into our products.


ABOUT YOU

 - Experience: You have 5+ years of hands-on software engineering experience in a fast-paced environment.

 - Systems: You have a deep understanding of large scale systems with experience building data pipelines, managing cloud infrastructure, cutting edge databases and standard deployment practices.

 - Generative AI: You have been hands-on with generative AI, experimenting, testing, and creatively solving real-world problems with it.

 - Bonus: You are a previous startup founder or founding engineer.




If you’re excited about building something truly unique, working with cutting-edge technology, and being part of a collaborative and ambitious team, we’d love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Content Moderator (Asia)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Us

Surreal is where the world’s leading talent manages their AI likeness. We’re still under wraps, but thrilled to share more with you privately.

The Role

We’re looking for a virtual assistant to help support our remotely distributed team. Some of the functions you might do include:

  1. Content Moderation: Review the content flagged by our systems to decide if our customers need to be alerted about deep fakes or other questionable content.

  2. Take Down: Submit policy breaking content for takedown to each social media platform.

  3. Research: Track and maintain databases of notable AI generated content.

  4. Content Creation: Create blog posts or internal daily reports summarizing the sentiment and insights of posts featuring our customers.

  5. Sales & Marketing: Collect and create assets that may be used in sales pitches and other collateral.

About You

We’re looking for the following qualities:

  1. Detail Oriented: You are thorough, complete, and accurate when executing tasks.

  2. Hustle: Can easily work around roadblocks to find another solution. You don’t give up easily, you don’t waste time doing things the hard way. This job won’t always be fun, in fact, the majority will be repetitive work but you have the fortitude to power through.

  3. Empathy: You understand the intent and goal of the client, customer, team member and can deliver towards that goal rather than being overly focused on a specific instruction.

  4. Communicative: You’re great at written and verbal communication and do not hesitate to reach out with questions. You can easily go from chat to email to a loom video when needed.
